Summary: Amphenol (APH) analyzed 1 bill with 3 direct impacts, receiving $855M in subsidies. Direct risk: 1.0. No indirect risks. High positive legislative impact.
SummaryKeypoints: H.R. 1 - One Big Beautiful Bill Act provides $250,000,000 in subsidy. affecting operations in United States. with long-term implementation The legislation states: "$250,000,000 for production capacity expansion and supplier base strengthening of long-range multi-service cruise missiles;"

H.R. 1 - One Big Beautiful Bill Act provides $225,000,000 in subsidy. affecting operations in United States. with long-term implementation The legislation states: "$225,000,000 for the expansion of production capacity for medium-range air-to-air missiles;"

H.R. 1 - One Big Beautiful Bill Act provides $380,000,000 in subsidy. affecting operations in United States. with long-term implementation The legislation states: "$380,000,000 for production capacity expansion for Navy and Air Force long-range anti-ship missiles;"
